description: Provide real-time and historical weather data, forecasts, alerts, and station information from the WeatherXM decentralized weather network worldwide. Enable detailed weather insights including temperature, wind, precipitation, UV index, and data quality assessments. Discover nearby weather stations and explore network coverage for comprehensive weather analysis.

apiKey.description: WeatherXM Pro API key required for accessing weather data

tools.name: get_current_weather
tools.description: Get current weather conditions for a specific WeatherXM station by station ID. Use this when you already know the station ID. For location-based queries, use 'get_weather_for_location' or 'search_weather_by_location' instead.

tools.name: get_hourly_forecast
tools.description: Get hourly weather forecast for a specific WeatherXM station by station ID. Use this when you already know the station ID. For location-based queries, use 'get_weather_forecast_for_location' instead.

hours.description: Number of hours to forecast (1-48, default 48)

tools.name: get_daily_forecast
tools.description: Get daily weather forecast for a specific WeatherXM station by station ID. Use this when you already know the station ID. For location-based queries, use 'get_weather_forecast_for_location' instead.

days.description: Number of days to forecast (1-7, default 7)

tools.name: get_stations_near
tools.description: Get a list of WeatherXM stations within a specified radius from a location. Uses the stations/near endpoint with radius in meters.

lat.description: Latitude of the center of the area in decimal degrees. Example: 40.7128 for New York City.

lon.description: Longitude of the center of the area in decimal degrees. Example: -74.0060 for New York City.

radius.description: Radius in meters for which stations are queried. Example: 5000 for 5km radius.

tools.name: get_historical_observations
tools.description: Get historical weather observations for a specific WeatherXM station on a specific date. Use this when you already know the station ID and want to see past weather data. Note: Only recent past dates are supported (typically last few days). Future dates are not supported.

date.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (UTC). Must be a recent past date (typically last few days), not in the future. Example: '2025-07-01'
